Class CardCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamePieces.CardCollection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class CardCollection
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Card>
    A collection of cards Can hold about any number of cards TODO replace much if it's graphics with fxml files

      • CardCollection

        public CardCollection(CardCollection.CollectionTypes collection,
                      JSONCardReader jCardReader,
                      CardIdCounter counter,
                      java.lang.String[] cardList)
        Create a collection with cards in it to start
        Parameters:
        collection - the type of collection this is
        jCardReader - where the cards should be read from
        cardIdCounter - what id the next created card should have, make sure to incarment every time it is used
        cardList - String[] sent to the cardChooser to allow it to be read as a bad iterrator

      • getObservableCardProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ObjectProperty<Card> getObservableCardProperty()
        Observable card may be null, since it flashes past null to make sure that the card is updated,
        This is a problem when trying to draw the same card twice in a row.

      • takeCard

        public Card takeCard(Card card)
              throws CardNotFoundException
        Take (get and remove) the chosen card
        Parameters:
        card - what card to take
        Returns:
        The card given as indata, but it is also removed from the collection
        Throws:
        CardNotFoundException - if the card is not in the collection
